content: variation #2 knit as above ending with row 16 finished size picot bind-off 11-13 inches deep 60-72 inches long my *cast on 2 stitches with knitting on cast- blocking was minimal so as not to on bind off 4 stitches slip_stitch from exaggerate the yarn-over holes and right hand needle back to left hand to maintain the cushy feeling of needle * unblocked garter stitch repeat between *ʼs until all stitches have been bound off variation #1 with regular bind-off © 2014 carolyn glauz-todrank all rights reserved for personal noncommercial use only though this pattern is simple please honor my copyright and do not reproduce for sale
